examples: Morning brought no relief from the heat.
The morning is a time of new beginnings and possibilities.
My mother waters the plants in our garden every morning.
I had a letter from my brother this morning.
I got a call from Dave this morning.
words.defineEn: the time of day that is between when the sun starts to rise and the middle of the day at twelve o'clock
words.defineVi: thời gian trong ngày là giữa khi mặt trời bắt đầu mọc và giữa ngày lúc mười hai giờ

examples: It really gets up my nose.
He's just getting up my nose so much at the moment.
He got up on the wrong side of the bed this morning.
You, the night owl, are getting up at 5 AM tomorrow?
I got up and looked out of the window.
words.defineEn: to wake up and get out of bed
words.defineVi: thức dậy và ra khỏi giường

examples: That hot guy had a good head on his shoulders.
The hotel had expensive rates during the holiday season.
The group has a new CD in the pipeline.
The police had the situation well in hand.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
words.defineVi: để ăn hoặc uống một cái gì đó

examples: The Siemens display goes the whole hog.
The cruise went very quickly.
My laptop went haywire
To go swimming/fishing/jogging.
The email went to everyone in the company.
words.defineEn: to travel or move from one location to another location
words.defineVi: để đi du lịch hoặc di chuyển từ một địa điểm đến một địa điểm khác

examples: The afternoon is a popular time for outdoor activities like picnics and sports.
The afternoon sun casts a warm glow on the buildings and trees.
We have a university lecture on art history this afternoon.
The weather turned quite chilly in the afternoon.
We had the run of the house for the afternoon.
words.defineEn: the time of day that is between twelve o'clock and the time that the sun starts to set
words.defineVi: thời gian trong ngày là giữa mười hai giờ và thời gian mà mặt trời bắt đầu lặn

examples: The team finished the race in first place.
You just finished your book?
She finishes her piano practice at 7 o'clock.
I've finished my work.
She always finishes her work assignments by the end of the week.
words.defineVi: để làm cho một cái gì đó kết thúc

examples: I really love summer evenings.
The college also runs evening classes in bricklaying and joinery.
Throughout the evening, the waiter handled the busy restaurant.
The party is on Friday evening.
Programs are running a few minutes behind schedule this evening.
words.defineEn: the time of day that is between the time that the sun starts to set and when the sky becomes completely dark
words.defineVi: thời gian trong ngày nằm giữa thời điểm mặt trời bắt đầu lặn và khi bầu trời trở nên tối hoàn toàn

examples: The professor made mincemeat of the speaker at the conference.
The kangaroo was making mincemeat of him.
A couple of years in the army should make a man of him.
Good wine can make a meal.
The news really made my day.
words.defineEn: (dummy verb) to carry out or perform an action that is specified by a noun
words.defineVi: (động từ giả) để thực hiện hoặc thực hiện một hành động được chỉ định bởi một danh từ

examples: Does this pub do lunches?
Does this pub do lunches?
Does the price include tax?
Microprocessors do the calculations in the twinkling of an eye.
The gang did a warehouse and a supermarket.
words.defineEn: to perform a particular activity or task
words.defineVi: để thực hiện một hoạt động cụ thể hoặc nhiệm vụ

examples: Watch your mouth!
The girls watched the development of this relationship with incredulity.
A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
Watch your head on the low ceiling.
Watch me!
words.defineEn: to look at a thing or person and pay attention to it for some time
words.defineVi: để nhìn vào một điều hoặc người và chú ý đến nó trong một thời gian

examples: Then again, some major thinkers are way ahead of the curve.
but then we hit trouble.
And then, on cue, the weather changed.
Things have changed dramatically since then.
Then the punishment of individuals invariably took account of the harm or damage done to the victim.
words.defineVi: sau khi điều được đề cập

examples: Are you sure you trust these tour guides?
It's not all fun and games being a tour guide.
Hi, my name is Marty Schatz, and I'm a beach bicycle tour guide.
And sometimes they'd, they'd come, they'd like drive by me and the tour guide would say, "And that's Conan O'Brien."
I did that tour for three years, which ended up turning into a paid opportunity for my second career as a bike tour guide.
words.defineEn: someone whose job is taking tourists to locations of interest
words.defineVi: một người có công việc đưa khách du lịch đến các địa điểm yêu thích

examples: The apartment has a secure entry system.
I won't have the apartment until next month.
She invited her friends over to her apartment for a movie night.
He rented an apartment in the city to be closer to his workplace.
She lives downstairs in the basement apartment.
words.defineEn: a place that has a few rooms for people to live in, normally part of a building that has other such places on each floor
words.defineVi: một nơi có một vài phòng để mọi người ở, thường là một phần của tòa nhà có những nơi khác như vậy trên mỗi tầng

examples: The subway map helped me navigate the different lines.
I like reading a book during my subway ride.
I prefer taking the subway instead of driving in the city.
There are designated seats for elderly and pregnant passengers on the subway.
In 2012, each Subway franchise generated an average of $482,000 a year.
words.defineEn: an underground railway system, typically in a big city
words.defineVi: một hệ thống đường sắt ngầm, thường ở một thành phố lớn

words.defineEn: a dish that consists of eggs mixed together and cooked in a frying pan
words.defineVi: một món ăn bao gồm trứng trộn với nhau và nấu trong chảo
